summary: REQ-73 is only partially addressed: the diff adds/updates a production build script that runs the existing Google Search Console (GSC) meta-tag verification and writes a detailed log file, but there is no evidence the full production promotion/deployment flow was re-run or that the live site was updated. Additionally, substantial new/changed UI/pages/routes appear in the frontend that were not requested and conflict with the “no new UI/UX changes” non-goal/constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Re-run the full production build and promotion/deployment flow again (same flow that previously failed), ensuring the existing Google Search Console meta-tag verification step blocks deployment if the tag is missing.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a build orchestrator and GSC verification script, but does not show any promotion/deployment execution (e.g., dfx deploy/promote steps, CI workflow changes, or deployment logs/artifacts) being run or wired into the deploy flow. It also does not show evidence that the deployment to the specified URL occurred.

missing_requirements.requirement: If the build/deploy fails again, capture the exact failing step and full error output in build logs/artifacts.
missing_requirements.reason: The script writes to a local file (production-build.log) and uses execSync with stdio: 'inherit', but the diff does not show CI/build pipeline artifact collection or deploy-step logging/artifact retention for the full build+deploy flow (especially for the deployment/promotion steps).

missing_requirements.requirement: If the build/deploy succeeds, the public site is updated and reachable at https://pd5nf-fqaaa-aaaan-qetaq-cai.icp0.io.
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the diff summary of a successful deployment (no canister deploy changes, no release/promotion automation updates, no recorded deployment output/artifact) that would update the live site at the given URL.

hallucinated_features.description: Large-scale frontend UI/UX and routing expansion (multiple new/updated pages/routes such as /me/events, /me/android-apk, admin dashboard/tools, bottom nav menu, updated TopNav/Footer).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-73 is strictly about re-running the existing production build/deploy flow with GSC verification and capturing actionable error output; it does not request adding new pages, routes, navigation, or other UI changes.

hallucinated_features.description: AdSense/ads script injection added to the app.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-73 (build/deploy retry + GSC verification + error capture only).

hallucinated_features.description: Extensive styling/theme changes (new OKLCH color system, typography changes, Tailwind theme extensions).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-73 and conflicts with the non-goal of no UI/UX changes beyond what is required to successfully re-run build/deploy.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin login feature and hardcoded credentials (yfo26/yfo2016) plus expanded admin dashboard tooling.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-73; this is new product functionality unrelated to build/deploy retry and error capture.

hallucinated_features.description: Project state summary updated to include additional UI/navigation refinements and monetization/AdSense readiness scope.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-73; expands scope beyond build/deploy retry and GSC verification.
